forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely before 5am, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Cloudy. Low around 39, with temperatures rising to around 41 overnight. West southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Rain And Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain and snow showers before 7am, then a slight chance of rain and snow showers between 7am and 10am. Mostly cloudy. High near 47, with temperatures falling to around 45 in the afternoon. West wind 5 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
